p: Eleven trials [8], [10], [11], [13], [17], [18], [22], [25]â€“ [28] reported the effect of Chinese herbs individually or in combination with oseltamivir on the global effectiveness rate. Among them, six trials demonstrated better effect favoring Chinese herbs: Qingfei Jiedu Decoction [10] showed better effect compared to oseltamivir, the combinations of oseltamivir and Tanreqing Injection [11], [13], oseltamivir and Xiyanping Injection [22] had better effect compared to oseltamivir alone, Qingjie Huashi decoction showed better effect compared to oseltamivir [25], and the combination of Reduning Injection [26] and ribavirin plus oseltamivir had better effect compared to ribavirin plus oseltamivir.
